description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Amongst the Shans ... With ... illustrations, and an historical sketch of the Shans by Holt S. Hallett ... Preceded by an introduction on the cradle of the Shan race by Terrien de Lacouperie" Author: COLQUHOUN, Archibald Ross. Contributor: HALLETT, Holt Samuel. Contributor: TERRIEN DE LACOUPERIE, Albert Étienne Jean Baptiste. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10057.df.12." Page: 214 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1885 Publisher: Field & Tuer Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000753466 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
